actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to prohibit persons from furnishing care as clinical psychologists to members and former members of the uniformed services and their dependents unless such persons meet certain professional qualifications.

summary.text: Sets forth the qualifications for a clinical psychologist furnishing care in any of the armed forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to prohibit persons from furnishing care as clinical psychologists to members and former members of the uniformed services and their dependents unless such persons meet certain professional qualifications.
